title: Easily Install and Load the mlr3 Package Family
Easily Install and Load the mlr3 Package Family
text: Functions objects following packages imported meta package: loading mlr3verse package, set deal regression, classification, cluster survival tasks: want get detailed information loaded packages, can call mlr3verse_info(): Additional packages can installed
code: library("mlr3verse") #> Loading required package: mlr3 mlr3verse_info() install.packages("mlr3verse", dependencies = TRUE)

what: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
text: 'mlr3' package family set packages machine-learning purposes built modular fashion. wrapper package aimed simplify installation loading core 'mlr3' packages. Get information 'mlr3' project https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/.

title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
text: Book mlr3: https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com Use cases examples gallery: https://mlr3gallery.mlr-org.com Cheat Sheets: https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3cheatsheets

title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package
text: mlr3verse installs subset packages one hand frequently required perform data analysis, hand pull many dependencies system requirements. Additional extension packages include: Analysis benchmark experiments: mlr3benchmark Task interface data bases: mlr3db Connector OpenML: mlr3oml Additional learners: https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3extralearners Hyperband tuning algorithm: mlr3hyperband Spatio-temporal resampling: mlr3spatiotempcv

title: mlr3verse: Easily Install and Load the 'mlr3' Package Family — mlr3verse-package

title: Print mlr3* package versions — mlr3verse_info
text: Returns package versions imported suggested mlr3 packages data.table::data.table(). Suggested packages installed listed version NA.

title: Print mlr3* package versions — mlr3verse_info
code: mlr3verse_info() #> Key: <package> #>              package version #>               <char>  <char> #>  1:            bbotk   1.5.0 #>  2:      miesmuschel 0.0.4.2 #>  3:             mlr3  0.22.1 #>  4:    mlr3batchmark   0.2.0 #>  5:      mlr3cluster  0.1.10 #>  6:         mlr3data   0.9.0 #>  7:           mlr3db   0.5.2 #>  8:     mlr3fairness   0.3.2 #>  9:          mlr3fda   0.2.0 #> 10:      mlr3filters   0.8.1 #> 11:      mlr3fselect   1.2.1 #> 12:    mlr3hyperband   0.6.0 #> 13:       mlr3inferr   0.1.0 #> 14:     mlr3learners   0.9.0 #> 15:          mlr3mbo   0.2.8 #> 16:         mlr3misc  0.16.0 #> 17:          mlr3oml  0.10.0 #> 18:    mlr3pipelines   0.7.1 #> 19:        mlr3proba   0.7.4 #> 20:      mlr3spatial   0.5.0 #> 21: mlr3spatiotempcv   2.3.2 #> 22:      mlr3summary   0.1.0 #> 23:        mlr3torch   0.1.2 #> 24:       mlr3tuning   1.3.0 #> 25: mlr3tuningspaces   0.5.2 #> 26:          mlr3viz  0.10.0 #> 27:          paradox   1.0.1 #> 28:             rush   0.1.2 #>              package version

title: mlr3verse 0.3.0

title: mlr3verse 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-27 Instead depending mlr3 packages, packages now imported. functions objects required data analysis re-exported, functions objects required extend packages exported. change aims provide thin view important functions mlr3 ecosystem thereby aid beginners get started. mlr3extralearners (https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3extralearners) package installed, automatically loaded learner dictionary automatically get populated.
